name: OpenMAPT1Auto
title: OpenMAP-T1 Automated Brain Parcellation

description.short: Automated brain MRI parcellation using OpenMAP-T1 deep learning model
description.long: This extension provides automated segmentation of T1-weighted brain MRI images into 280 anatomical regions using the OpenMAP-T1 deep learning model developed by Johns Hopkins University. It offers a user-friendly interface within 3D Slicer for clinical and research applications.

acknowledgments.text: This extension is built upon OpenMAP-T1 developed by Taiki Nishimaki and Johns Hopkins University. We are grateful for their excellent work and for making it available to the research community.

license.model: JHU Research Software License - Non-Commercial, No Redistribution
license.note: Model files are NOT included and must be downloaded separately from the official OpenMAP-T1 repository

screenshots.caption: OpenMAPT1Auto user interface showing input selection and processing options
3D visualization of automated brain parcellation results with 280 anatomical regions

features: Automated brain parcellation into 280 anatomical regions

model_download.instructions: Users must download model files separately from the official OpenMAP-T1 repository and accept the JHU license terms

extension.text: Acer, N. (2025). OpenMAPT1Auto: 3D Slicer Extension for Automated Brain Parcellation. GitHub repository.

underlying_work.text: Nishimaki, T., et al. (2024). OpenMAP-T1: A Rapid Deep Learning Approach to Parcellation of 280 Anatomical Regions to Cover the Whole Brain.
